entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He was born and raised at an orphanage, educated at Hogwarts, worked at Borgin and Burkes, and spent his years of exile in Albania.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a friend of Harry's who makes a sarcastic comment about searching the entire country of Albania.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Harry's who speculates that the Horcruxes are not in Albania because they were made before Harry went into exile.

entities.name: albania
entities.description: Albania is a country where Harry spent his years of exile and where Ron suggests searching for the Horcruxes.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is a school where Harry was educated.

entities.name: borgin and burkes
entities.description: Borgin and Burkes is a store where Harry worked after completing school.

entities.name: vol
entities.description: Vol is not explicitly described in the text but it seems to be associated with You-Know-Who.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is a person who is associated with Vol and the snake.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who is certain that the snake is the sixth Horcrux.

entities.name: the orphanage
entities.description: The orphanage is where Harry was born and raised.

entities.name: the goblin's revenge
entities.description: The Goblin's Revenge is a book that is mentioned in the text but its relevance to the story is unclear.

entities.name: the snake
entities.description: The snake is one of Harry's Horcruxes and is associated with You-Know-Who.

relationships.description: Harry spent his years of exile in Albania.
Ron suggested searching the entire country of Albania for the Horcruxes.
Hermione speculated that the Horcruxes are not in Albania because they were made before Harry went into exile.
Harry worked at Borgin and Burkes after completing school.
Dumbledore is certain that the snake is the sixth Horcrux.
You-Know-Who is associated with the snake.
